author: audra@dailydot.com (Audra Schroeder)
title: Beyonc√© Performs Stunning Ode to Motherhood at Grammys
text:
BTW 
The theme was motherhood, and Beyonc√© 's Grammys performance was christened by her own mother, Tina. 
It was a spiritual performance, one heavy on symbol and imagery, much like her record-breaking pregnancy announcement. At one point, Tina, Beyonc√©, and daughter Blue Ivy were projected onstage. She kicked off the performance with ‚ÄúLove Drought,‚Äù then segued into ‚ÄúSandcastles," both from the Grammy -nominated Lemonade . ‚Äî Otto Von Biz Markie (@Passionweiss) February 13, 2017 If you're any artist who has to follow this Beyonc√© performance tonight pic.twitter.com/7tn1R9wAwT ‚Äî Dave Itzkoff (@ditzkoff) February 13, 2017 CAN YOU IMAGINE BEING THE PERSON IN CHARGE OF TIPPING A PREGNANT BEYONCE BACKWARDS TOGSKGJIORJTPKQ ‚Äî Another Round (@anotherround)   her whole family know ur lying and they're waiting to catch you out there pic.twitter.com/eJmfIrFx2q ‚Äî Desus Nice (@desusnice)   you get paid and your squad is broke af... üòÇüòÇüòÇ #grammys @beyonce pic.twitter.com/hj2VOT2ANV
